# 𒀩 ᶜALAN •column 𓋴 𓌬 𓅓 𓏜

𒀩 ALAN / ALAM figure, form, image, statue, figurine ⇔ 𓀾 , 𓋴 𓌬 𓐝 𓀹 𒍏𒀩

𒀩 ≈ -nik -nite suffix in 𒋺𒀩 TAK₄.ALAN τεχνίτης tekhnítēs technician "craftsman"

𒀀𒇻𒍣𒉡 Ἀλαζών Ἀlazón ᾰ̓λᾱζών alāzṓn boastful, pretentious
𒀀𒇻𒍣𒉡 aluzinnu 'boastful, clownish fraud, pretending to possess medical skills'
